text: The squig is a ferocious beast, and one will never stop growing.The largest amongst them are called colossal squigs.
South of the Empire lies a barren plain of hills at the edge of the Badlands. It is there that the largest of all Goblins can be found known as Hill Goblins.Theyâ€™re as nasty as Orcs and as vicious.
Night goblins who prefer to stab from a longer distance then their sword friends.
Armed with a poison sword and tribal shield, these small gobbos form the backbone of the Forest Goblin infantry.
Used more to support troops than fight head on, these gobbos happily trust their pointies in the enemies back.
The skirmishers of the Forest Goblins screen the fields and soften the enemy with a rain of arrows before the real fighting begins.
These "Gretchin" are mostlly used as servants in the greenskin society. In battle, they rely on their small size and sheer numbers to swarm the enemy.
